featured.text: A slave raid starts with an assembly of the Amazon warriors outside their own nest.
Up until recently, the only way for a Maasai boy to achieve warrior status was to single-handedly kill a lion with his spear.
A Maasai warrior is rarely seen without his spear and shield.

other.text: To exemplify the types of weapons used by Maasai warriors.
To explain how Maasai warriors hunt for deer in the wild.
Which of the following pictures best represents the image of a typical Maasai warrior? (A) (B) (C) (D) 36.

definition.zh_def: 戰士，指在戰鬥中勇敢作戰的人。
definition.en_def: A person who fights in battles or engages in warfare, often characterized by bravery and skill.
definition.example: The warrior led his troops into battle with great courage.
